parameters.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$os = Get-CimInstance Win32_OperatingSystem; $cpu = (Get-CimInstance Win32_Processor).LoadPercentage; $boot = $os.LastBootUpTime; $up = (Get-Date) - $boot; $ramTotal = [math]::Round($os.TotalVisibleMemorySize/1MB,1); $ramFree = [math]::Round($os.FreePhysicalMemory/1MB,1); $disks = Get-CimInstance Win32_LogicalDisk | ForEach-Object { \"$($_.DeviceID) $(if($_.Size){[math]::Round($_.FreeSpace/1GB,1)})GB free\" }; Write-Output \"CPU: $cpu% | RAM: $($ramTotal - $ramFree)/$ramTotal GB | Uptime: $($up.Days)j $($up.Hours)h | Disks: $($disks -join ', ')\""

=powershell -NoProfile -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Speech; $s = New-Object System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer; $s.Speak('Bonjour. Rapport du matin: {{ $json.online }} noeuds IA en ligne. Systeme operationnel. JARVIS pret.')"
